global.videoNotSupported: The video is not supported by your browser.

home.title: Home
home.description: Hello! I'm CryptoShalix, a self-taught web and software developer. Welcome to my website!

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description:
These are some testimonials from my clients and students!

In their own words, they demonstrate the quality of my services, and seeing them reminds me that together we go further, motivating me to grow more and help more people.

Thank you for being part of our success community!

If you want to leave your testimonial, you can do it from the button below.
testimonials.fieldService: Select the service you received and for which you want to create your testimonial.
testimonials.fieldUrl: URL of your website or social network
testimonials.fieldMessagePlaceholder: How were you before receiving the service/training, and how do you feel now?
testimonials.msgError: Error sending the testimonial! Please try again later, or contact support if the error persists.

about.title: About
about.description: Hello! I'm CryptoShalix, a self-taught web and software developer. Welcome to my website!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description:
Don't hesitate to contact me!

- Suggestions:
You have a suggestion to improve any section, product, or service of the page.

- Errors:
You have found an error (bug) on the page. Reporting it for repair is appreciated.

- Queries:
You have a query about any section, product, or service of the page.

- Requests:
You need more information about any product, service, or the functioning of the page.
contact.fieldContactMethodDescription: At least 1 of the following contact methods must be provided.
contact.msgDataSharing: The contact data provided will NOT be shared or stored, and will be used solely to reply to your message.
contact.msgSuccess:
Message sent successfully! Thank you for contacting me!
I'll try to reply as soon as possible.
contact.msgError: Error sending the message! Please try again later.
contact.msgAlert: Attention! All required fields must be filled.
contact.msgErrorFields: Please fill in all required fields.

reservations.title: Book your appointment
reservations.description:
If you want to hire the services of Technical Support and/or Soul Channeling, you can do it from here.

Remember that the Technical Support service costs €25/hour, and the Soul Channeling service costs €15 per session.

If you have any questions or inquiries, you can contact me from the Contact section.

store.title: Store
store.description:
Here you can find all the training, services and products offered by BitAkashico.

If you have any questions or queries, or any problems with the purchase, you can send a message from the Contact section.
store.selectionPlaceholder: Select a service, formation, or product

msg.generic: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later. If the error persists, send a screenshot of the error through the contact form.
msg.notFound: The page you are looking for does not exist.
